item.content:
We are glad to have you as a guest of our third, secret event in collaboration with Linea Records. ðŸŒŽ BOLOGNA CITY CENTER UNDERGROUND - SECRET LOCATION ðŸŒŽ From 22:00 till late. LIMITED AVAILABILITY! ðŸ“£ FUNKTION ONE SOUND SYSTEM ðŸ“£

Invite only, private noncommercial party.

Techno - Acid - Modular Bleep and Bloops ðŸ’½ DJs (A-Z) ðŸ’½:

  • ALESSANDRO CHELI - Listen here - RA - Experimental Electronics, AI generated hard acid grooves from Italy
  • ELLIOT K - Listen Here - RA - Sound and mastering engineer from Berlin & Linea Records founder. Tribal percussions, warm sub frequencies, psychedelic techno from another dimension.
  • NO.NAME - Listen Here - Instagram - Dancefloor master based between Berlin and Italy: Fast, acid, aggressive and meticulously programmed hard techno grooves.

ðŸ›¸ LIVE VISUAL PROJECTIONS - (A-Z) ðŸ›¸

  • KEVIN SMUGGLES - Instagram - With a background as a researcher in physics and quantum optics, Kevin’s projections are an intersection between organic lifeforms and synthetic, glitched machines. Kevin turns lines of code written in real time into patterns, feedback loops of light and colors that evolve with the music.
  • ZUKOROBASHI - Instagram - As an architect based in Milan, Zukorobashi’s visuals range from dark surreal, warpy dreams to impossible architectural patterns: blocks, cubes and deserted landscapes glitch and distort one into another in a brutalist visual dance.

Artwork by LOBU

Follow us on instagram @danzasegreta for more offline events!
